description: DOCUMENTS AND DRAWINGS ARE NOT AVAILABLE ELECTRONICALLY FOR THIS APPLICATION. PLEASE CALL THE CASE OFFICER. Non-material amendment to planning permission PP/23/07420 (Alterations undertaken alongside refurbishment; installation of spiral staircase; replacement of external plant) for amendments as follows: Lower Ground Floor: 1. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.20 Shower Room.2. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.01 Gym. 3. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.17 Storage. Ground Floor: No Changes. First Floor: 1. Minor changes to internal door opening into F.08 En-Suite 02. Second Floor: 1. Layout change in Guest Suite 3 and En-Suite 5. Third Floor: 1. Location of door opening changed in T.01 Staff Bedroom. 2. Minor changes to internal door openings into T.06 Powder Room. 3. Configuration of joinery and door openings into T.08 Storage. 4. Configuration of joinery and door openings into T.09 Storage.
